• A preprint of our work titled "TabDPT: Scaling Tabular Foundation Models" is out! We introduce a novel model that leverages both self-supervised and in-context learning to enhance generalization and transfer learning capabilities.

    August 2024

  • Our work, "A Geometric View of Data Complexity: Efficient Local Intrinsic Dimension Estimation with Diffusion Models", received a spotlight at NeurIPS 2024.

    August 2024

    August 2024

  • Thrilled to be mentoring an undergraduate student on a research project this fall at Vector Institute & University of Toronto.

    August 2024

  • Presented three papers at ICML 2024, including two as the first author: a main conference poster, two workshop orals (presented by myself), and five workshop posters. Highlights include: "A Geometric Explanation of the Likelihood OOD Detection Paradox" (main conference poster), "A Geometric View of Data Complexity" (workshop presentations), and "A Geometric Framework for Understanding Memorization in Generative Models" (workshop posters).

    July 2024

    July 2024

  • Our paper, "A Geometric Explanation of the Likelihood OOD Detection Paradox", was accepted to ICML 2024. This work addresses a longstanding paradox in likelihood-based deep generative models.
